event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: A FLP chip has detected it does not have sufficient power to continue operating.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
The FLP chip has detected it does not have sufficient power to continue operating.

The precise FLP chip cannot be identified from this fault.

The domain or domains using the IOU with the FLP chip will be reset.

Another fault that deconfigures resources will likely occur at approximately
the same time as this fault.


The recommended service action for this event is outlined below.

       LEGEND

      RED        = SUNW-MSG-ID
      BLUE     = EVENT_ID
      GREEN  = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Mar 27 15:14:16 nwk-dc2-1-sc0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: nwk-dc2-1  
   EVENT-ID: 3fc4c844-c813-4336-bff5-cd52ec46fd7b
   Refer to %FMAURL%/SCF-8004-92 for detailed information.


   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID: SCF-8004-92, TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Critical
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 27 15:14:16 PDT 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: nwk-dc2-1, HOSTNAME: nwk-dc2-1-sc0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: 3fc4c844-c813-4336-bff5-cd52ec46fd7b
   DESC: A FLP chip has detected it does not have sufficient power to continue operating.
   Refer to %FMAURL%/SCF-8004-92 for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: Nothing is deconfigured.
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
   IMPACT: The domain using the FLP chip will be reset.
   REC-ACTION: Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command


        xscf> fmdump -v -u 3fc4c844-c813-4336-bff5-cd52ec46fd7b

        TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
        Mar 27 15:14:16.5525 3fc4c844-c813-4336-bff5-cd52ec46fd7b SCF-8004-92
          100%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.asic.flp.power.fail

                Problem in: hc:///chassis=0
                   Affects: -
                        FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=nwk-dc2-1:
                             server-id=nwk-dc2-1-sc0/component=CHASSIS



Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.



If you require additional information, please refer to InfoDoc #87402.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The domain using the FLP chip will be reset.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: Nothing is deconfigured. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: FLP chip detected a power failure.
